metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Far Too Young to Die has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Far Too Young to Die has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Major,  and D Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
